title: User journey experience event

journeyID.title: A Journey identifier
journeyID.description: An identifier of the journey created by the marketer.

journeyVersionID.title: A Journey Version identifier
journeyVersionID.description: An identifier denoting the version of journey on which the user is active.

actionID.title: Action identifier
actionID.description: An identifier denoting the associated action during the step transition.

journeyContext.title: A Journey Context
journeyContext.description: set of attributes which defines the context associated with any marketing activity.

journeyID.title: A Journey identifier
An identifier which represent journey in the journey context

journeyVersionID.title: A Journey Version identifier
An identifier which represent a specific journey version in the journey context.

actionID.title: Action identifier
An identifier which represent an action in the journey context.
